data.message: I got a message from facebook, and I don't think it is real can you please tell me if it is real? As when I did what it asked me to it went to a page that is not a valid page I will put it on here so maybe you can answer me I dont' know were else to ask the question so here it is!

replies.message: Hey Robin. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign sounds like a hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1QwvQQw. -Jordan

Facebook please reply. I got a thing from Facebook...the e has a weird squiggly line above it so I know it is not this page. It says about blocking my account. I went to the page and it has done that to so many others too? Who are they? What's with this scam, spam crap? The link that they used claiming wrongdoing is  a comment I made about from Family Feud 2 the game. I mentioned how something is wrong with the game. This is not the first time this has happened. Should I reset my password? Should I delete the game?
Hey Todd. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. If you think your account might have been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://on.fb.me/1QwGYwI. -Jordan

I'll reset my pw again. This has happened before form FB or some BS replica. I reset my pw because I thought it was legit. Then I go to get on Christmas Eve day I think and I guess you all temporarily froze my because you got a reading of an attempted log in from Columbus. (I said it wasn't me.) It all started from that BS block and a link that was used was only me askin why the Family Feud 2 game wasn't working. Btw I tried to search that weird Facebook with the squiggly above the e...nothing. They appeared in my notifications log.
So Facebook should I delete the Family Feud 2 game?

Facebook
Please help in the retrieval of the account has been disabled brother account
rabahsabah1967@outlook.com
